ygData.subject: RE: Pokemon (Blue)  Query
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL.  You people are really too much.  Just a simple game for all to enjoy can talk to the extend of sex and violence, heheh.
ygData.messageBody:
LOL. You people are really too much. Just a simple game for all to enjoy can talk to the extend of sex and violence, heheh.



On Monday, 27 December, 1999 1:20 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...] wrote:
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> Actually Pokemon is a very violent game.........
>
> It teaches kids(In the case of Ziltus VERY overgrown 'kid') to go around beating up
> animals then imprison them in a tiny space and only release them when they are
> hungry and agressive to fight other animals.........
>
> LKW wrote:
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > Wah kow, talking abt Pokemon also can think of big penis. Dun see the word
> > POKEmon then get SEXited lah. LOL!
> >
> > Anyway back to POKEmon. ;P
> >
> > I'm now stucked. ;( I fight thru' the tunnel that contain moonstone and
> > fossil. Becoz my pokemon is near to death, I quickly jump, jump and jump
> > across all grass to find the next town to get a pokemon center. After
> > healing all my pets, I then realised I'm stucked in that town (since I can
> > only jump down but not up)! I dun have the CUT HM and I can't cut across
> > the tree. Any idea I can get out of the town?
> >
> > I got few HMs so far, like watergun (ok Garren dun let ya imagination run
> > wild again pls, hehe), lighting something etc. H/w, all my 6 pokemons
> > already got 3-4 skills. I dunno which shld to learn the new skills. I
> > worry I will find some pokemon more powerful and I will have to switch to
> > them. If that's so, those HM will be wasted.
> >
> > Thx.
> >
> > On Sunday, 26 December, 1999 10:13 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
> > [SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> > > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> > >
> > > omg. Chipokoman (I remember the Southpark one. damn funny. The Japanese
> > > always say "Your penis is very big. It's the largest penis I've ever
> > > seen. Our penis are small. So we cannot do anything etc etc". Then all
> > > the guys in Southpark have a very funny smile on their face).
> > >
> > > heheheh
> > >
> > > Leshrec wrote:
> > > >
> > > > From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
> > > >
> > > > 1. His aide is in a building you will meet later, but you need to catch
> > 20
> > > > or more pokemons to get it. The aide is in a room where there are
> > telescopes
> > > > (I think, can't remember)
> > > > 2. You have to find HM like cut to be able to use it and you must teach
> > the
> > > > HM to a pokemon. Cut is on the captain of the ship.
> > > > 4.Carry 6 always, it doesn't hurt to carry those extra pokemons just in
> > case
> > > > the pokemons faint or you need to counter another pokemon.
> > > > Water strong against Earth and Fire
> > > > Thunder strong against water and flying pokemons but weak against earth
> > > > Fire good against ice but weak against water
> > > > Earth good against physical attacks like scratch but weak against water
> > > > Still got some others but I can't remember, maybe try searching the
> > web.
> > > > 5.If you complete finish liao, DON'T use the megaball on anything less
> > than
> > > > a mewtwo, since the megaball is 100% catch. Btw, the blue and red no
> > > > difference in terms of gameplay, except the different pokemons
> > available and
> > > > the rarity of a certain pokemon in an area. The final dungeon also
> > same,
> > > > except for the yellow version where the final dungeon is different.
> > > >
> > > > Leshrec
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > > Sent: Friday, December 24, 1999 9:50 AM
> > > > Subject: [sg-everquest] Pokemon (Blue) Query
> > > >
> > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > 1. I got Prof. Oak advice to get a FLASH HM form his aside, where is
> > his
> > > > > aside? I search his lab and talk to all of his assistants but no one
> > tell
> > > > > me anything abt it.
> > > > >
> > > > > 2. I defend the 2nd boss trainer, and he give me tha badge with allow
> > me
> > > > to
> > > > > use CUT. How to use CUT (and FLASH)?
> > > > >
> > > > > 3. Where can I find good tips/cheats/guide on Pokemon (Blue) in
> > internet?
> > > > >
> > > > > 4. How many Pokemons u guys carry with you all time? Which are the
> > good
> > > > > ones to train (I mean fromi water. fire, earth so that depending on
> > my
> > > > > enemies, I can choose the right Pokemon to beat them).
> > > > >
> > > > > 5. Any helpful tips? ;)
> > > > >
